snippet: A reader asks: What does it say about our political system if someone as bigoted and untrustworthy as Donald Trump is elected? Other readers are invited to reply....
lead_paragraph: A reader asks: What does it say about our political system if someone as bigoted and untrustworthy as Donald Trump is elected? Other readers are invited to reply.

headline.print_headline: Invitation to a Dialogue: Twilight of Democracy?
headline.main: Invitation to a Dialogue: Twilight of Democracy?
